Dialogue: Oh? Oh! OH MY GOD! I see, oh, God, I can finally see!
My faith has been tested for so long but now, oh now, I see you here before me.
Your presence is, oh, OVERWHELMING! To think I would someday bask before you, OH GOD, how I love you so! I love you so much! I see you! Your vision! Oh, it is marvelous. It is perfect!
I saw you in my ritual, but only a glimpse. Now I can truly see. Ever onwards into the abyss of our one true God! Neverending. Full of wonder! Our beautiful eye in the sky. Oh, so beautiful.
Stay. Oh, God, please stay! Do not leave me! Please, never leave me. I love you.
